Bleezer is the bloggers dreamware ap. It:
  • is freeware
  • works on windows, linux, and mac
  • tags delicious or technoroti
  • pings your advertiser
  • works both on and offfline
Bleezer can do much more, but those are the services that caught my eye. Setup was breeze, all I did was enter my blogger user id and password, and the interface is clean and easy to use. I am very interested to see how the pinging service works and am excited that I finally have a way to blog offline.

Bleezer can be downloaded for any os here.
